thread.title: Slash and Hip on a Natural Slalom Course in Turkey
thread.title_full: Slash and Hip on a Natural Slalom Course in Turkey

title: Slash and Hip on a Natural Slalom Course in Turkey
text:
Slash and Hip on a Natural Slalom Course in Turkey Take a POV ride with GoPro master Aaron Chase and former Rampage winner Cedric Gracia. By Anthony Sansotta on 22 February 2017 
After "yabba-dabba-doo'ing" his way through Flintstone City in the previous Chasing Trail clip, Aaron Chase 's quest for epic trails didn't take him too far down the road. Chase stayed in Cappadocia, Turkey, and cashed in on another one of its many gems, with former Red Bull Rampage champ Cedric Garcia and Turkish downhill champ Burak Uzun in tow. 
We're going for the Turkish bomb drop right now! Aaron Chase 
Ride along in the video above as the trio descend "Luge" trail â€” sending manuals, sliding down sketch ridgelines and ripping between the natural dirt spires at one of Cappadocia's top spots. Want more Chasing Trail clips with Aaron Chase? Head down the rabbit hole in the links below: Related Stories
